rationale: The segment reports suspension of other imports but does not contain an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Imports of live ostrich and raw ostrich products will also be suspended, said Chief veterinary officer Dr Albertina Shilongo.

rationale: This is a factual statement about import suspension, without using high-potency language.
statement_text: Imports of live ostrich and raw ostrich products will also be suspended, said Chief veterinary officer Dr Albertina Shilongo.
